__e: Dear Rosie. There's a rose in my heart...for you.
ALEX: Rosie, I understand that you haven't been in touch. And I just need to know one thing.
Can you just stop jumping up and down? ROSIE: I'm just checking everyone's here.
Rosie didn't treat me like I was...
Rosie found a letter that... I wrote to David when I was pregnant.
Rosie saw it, and it got her killed.
You'll look out for my Rosie and my boys?
Now, I want you to think of Richard and Rosie, and not on that baby inside of you.
So then it was just Rosie and us.
